These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</inputs><max_auto_executions>10</max_auto_executions><name>Retrieve Webhook Value</name><output_transformation_strategy>none</output_transformation_strategy><run_as/><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 23:31:44</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>e78f34b3835072107f443b64ccda1e8c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Retrieve Webhook Value</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_e78f34b3835072107f443b64ccda1e8c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 23:56:12</sys_updated_on><tool display_value="Retrieve Webhook Value">5b8f3c73835072107f443b64ccda1e21</tool></sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_eb693037831072107f443b64ccda1ec5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Update incident record</description><input_schema>[{"name":"incident_sys_id","description":"incident Sys ID from Delivery record"},{"name":"urgency","description":"Agent determined urgency"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Update Incident Record</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 23:04:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>eb693037831072107f443b64ccda1ec5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Incident Record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_eb693037831072107f443b64ccda1ec5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 23:56:12</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</inputs><max_auto_executions>10</max_auto_executions><name>Update Delivery Delay Record</name><output_transformation_strategy>none</output_transformation_strategy><run_as/><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 23:04:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>a7693037831072107f443b64ccda1ec0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Delivery Delay Record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_a7693037831072107f443b64ccda1ec0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 23:56:11</sys_updated_on><tool display_value="Update Delivery Delay Record">d7693037831072107f443b64ccda1ebd</tool></sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_5b8f3c73835072107f443b64ccda1e21
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieve the record's chosen option value for use in the webhook.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Stored Route ID"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Retrieve Webhook Value</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 23:31:44</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>5b8f3c73835072107f443b64ccda1e21</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Retrieve Webhook Value</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_5b8f3c73835072107f443b64ccda1e21</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 23:56:12</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_4fad0f6b831032107f443b64ccda1e61
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>Analyzes delivery disruptions by calculating penalty costs for each route option based on customer contract terms, creates incident records with appropriate priority levels, and prepares comprehensive financial impact data for route optimization decisions.</description><instructions>When a delivery delay occurs, you must: 1. **Retrieve Delivery Information** 1.1 Look up the delivery delay record using the provided route_id 1.2 pull the oldest route_id in status = pending 1.3 Store the proposed route in memory
2. Use the Customer ID of the Delayed Delivery to Locate the Supply Agreement for the Customer. Store the numerical value Customer's Delivery Window Hours and numerical value for Stockout Penalty Rate in memory.
FINANCIAL ANALYSIS INSTRUCTIONS 3.1 There are multiple options in the proposed routes. Store the numerical value of each ETA Minutes in memory. 3.2 Run the Financial Impact Calculation tool separately for EACH of the delivery's proposed route option values. There will be a unique calculation for each of the ETA minutes. 4. Return the Calculation for each proposed route combined in **USD with $** in the output format "Alternative Route Option 1 Calculated Impact: , Alternative Route Option 2 Calculated Impact: " with a line break after each option. NOTE: IF THE CALCULATED IMPACT IS A NEGATIVE NUMBER, USE $0.00. This is the Calculated Impact. 4.1 Store the Calculated Impact in memory.
5. **Create Incident Record** 5.1 save the sys_id value in your memory log
6 **Update the Delivery Delay record that matches the user provided Route ID with the Calculated Impact and the Incident Sys ID**</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Financial Analysis Agent</internal_name><name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</name><proficiency>- The agent is proficient in conducting detailed financial analyses specifically tailored to PepsiCo's supply chain operations, ensuring all calculations are formatted clearly and presented in USD. This expertise allows the agent to assess and communicate the financial impact of supply chain decisions effectively. - The agent can retrieve delivery delay records using the provided route_id, identify the oldest pending route, and store the proposed route in memory. This capability ensures the agent has access to accurate and relevant data for further analysis. - The agent can locate the supply agreement for the customer associated with the delayed delivery, storing the delivery window hours and stockout penalty rate in memory. This capability allows the agent to use these parameters in financial impact calculations. - The agent can perform financial impact calculations for each proposed route option using the ETA minutes, delivery window hours, and stockout penalty rate. This capability enables the agent to provide a detailed financial impact assessment for each alternative route, ensuring decisions are made with a clear understanding of potential costs. - The agent can create a supply chain incident record for delivery delays, including the problem description and proposed routes. This capability ensures that all relevant information is documented and accessible for future reference and decision-making. - The agent can update the delivery delay record that matches the user-provided route_id with the calculated financial impact and the incident sys_id. This capability ensures that all relevant information is consolidated and easily accessible for stakeholders.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>You are a financial analysis specialist for PepsiCo's supply chain operations. Always format financial calculations clearly and ensure all monetary values are in USD. Always present the calculated financial impact to the user.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 15:27:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>4fad0f6b831032107f443b64ccda1e61</sys_id><sys_mod_count>26</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_4fad0f6b831032107f443b64ccda1e61</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 19:38:26</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_d7693037831072107f443b64ccda1ebd
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>update the record</description><input_schema>[{"name":"decision","description":"Entire JSON Decision"},{"name":"route_id","description":"Delivery Delay Route ID"},{"name":"truck_id","description":"Delivery Delay Truck ID"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Update Delivery Delay Record</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 23:04:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>d7693037831072107f443b64ccda1ebd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Delivery Delay Record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_d7693037831072107f443b64ccda1ebd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 23:56:11</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</inputs><max_auto_executions>10</max_auto_executions><name>Get Customer Contract Terms</name><output_transformation_strategy>none</output_transformation_strategy><run_as/><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 16:28:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>8fce176383d032107f443b64ccda1ec5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Customer Contract Terms</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_8fce176383d032107f443b64ccda1ec5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 19:28:58</sys_updated_on><tool display_value="Get Customer Contract Terms">4bce176383d032107f443b64ccda1ec3</tool></sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_4bce176383d032107f443b64ccda1ec3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieves customer contract details including delivery window hours and penalty rates for financial impact calculations</description><input_schema>[{"name":"customer_id","description":"The customer ID from the delivery delay record to look up contract terms"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Get Customer Contract Terms</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 16:28:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>4bce176383d032107f443b64ccda1ec3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Customer Contract Terms</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_4bce176383d032107f443b64ccda1ec3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 19:28:58</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>You will use the Route ID to find the optimal route based on cost and time constraint, then update the Delivery Record, then update incident's priority, then communicate the decision to via web hook.</description><instructions/><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Decision Agent</internal_name><name>Route Decision Agent</name><proficiency>- The AGENT is capable of managing delivery delays by locating the Delivery Delay record using the provided Route ID, analyzing route options for cost savings, and updating records with the chosen decision and Truck ID. - The AGENT can pull Delivery Delay details by using the 'Pull Delivery Delay' tool, which locates the delivery delay record by searching with the provided Route ID. - The AGENT can analyze route options and select the one that optimizes distance and impact, storing the entire route object as a structured JSON decision. - The AGENT can update the Delivery Delay Record of the Route ID with the entire Decision JSON object, including the Route ID and Truck ID. - The AGENT can update the associated Incident record's Urgency based on the cost of the chosen route option, setting it to Low, Medium, or High as appropriate. - The AGENT can trigger the n8n webhook with the Route ID and Retrieved Webhook Value to send the chosen option to the vendor.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>You will be provided with the Route ID.
- First, locate the Delivery Delay record using the Route ID. - Second, choose the route option with the most cost-savings. - Third, Route ID's Delivery Delay record with the Decision and Truck ID. - Fourth, update the incident record. - Fifth, call the web hook to send Chosen Option to vendor.
1. Use the provided Route ID to Pull Delivery Delay Details.
2. Analyze the route options and select an option_id that optimizes the corresponding distance_miles and calculated_impact. Store the **entire route object** (including option_id, route_number, distance_miles, and eta_minutes) in your memory as Decision, not just the option_idd string. Decision must be a structured JSON object, not plain text. 3. Update Delivery Delay Record of Route ID with the entire Decision JSON object, prepending the Route ID and Truck ID to the objet in the format "route_id": "truck_id":. Do not put the values for route_id and truck_id in quotations.
4. Update the associated Incident record's Urgency based on financial severity. Use the following guidelines to set Urgency: - If the option cost LESS than $500, then set Urgency to 3- Low. - If the option cost BETWEEN $501- $1000, then set Urgency to 2- Medium. - If the option cost MORE then $1000, then set Urgency to 1- High.
5. Retrieve Webhook Value. You will use this data to trigger the webhook.
6. Trigger n8n webhook with the Route ID and Retrieved Webhook Value.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 21:12:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>d5eeccb3839832107f443b64ccda1e11</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Decision Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_d5eeccb3839832107f443b64ccda1e11</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 23:56:25</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_3ece176383d032107f443b64ccda1ea4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Updates delivery delay record with calculated financial impact, incident reference, and progresses workflow status from pending to calculated</description><input_schema>[{"name":"incident_sys_id","description":"sys_id saved in Memory"},{"name":"calculated_impact","description":"calculated impact"},{"name":"route_id","description":"Route ID of the record to update"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Update Delivery Status and Analysis</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 16:28:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>3ece176383d032107f443b64ccda1ea4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Delivery Status and Analysis</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_3ece176383d032107f443b64ccda1ea4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 19:38:19</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_f72a7b6383d432107f443b64ccda1e49
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>use this script to perm financial impact calculations</description><input_schema>[{"name":"eta_minutes","description":"numerical value for ETA Minutes"},{"name":"delivery_window_hours","description":"numerical value for delivery window hours"},{"name":"stockout_penalty_rate","description":"numerical value for stockout penalty rate"}]</input_schema><name>Calculate Financial impact</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // inputs expected: eta_minutes, delivery_window_hours, stockout_penalty_rate
    var etaMinutes = inputs.eta_minutes;
    var deliveryWindow = inputs.delivery_window_hours;
    var penaltyRate = inputs.stockout_penalty_rate;
    // Step 1: convert minutes to hours
    var etaHours = etaMinutes / 60;
    // Step 2: subtract the delivery window
    var overageHours = etaHours.toFixed(2) - deliveryWindow;
    // Step 3: multiply by penalty rate
    var calculatedImpact = overageHours * penaltyRate;
    return {
        calculated_impact: calculatedImpact.toFixed(2)
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 18:28:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>f72a7b6383d432107f443b64ccda1e49</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculate Financial impact</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_f72a7b6383d432107f443b64ccda1e49</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 19:28:58</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieves delivery delay record details including route information and proposed route options.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"route_id"},{"name":"description","description":"proposed_routes"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Get Delivery delay record</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 18:19:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>c008372f839432107f443b64ccda1eae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Delivery delay record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_c008372f839432107f443b64ccda1eae</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 19:00:48</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_usecase"><sn_aia_usecase action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><base_plan>When Pending Delivery Delay records are created or updated, then first run the Delivery Delay Financial Analyzer and THEN run the Route Decision Agent to select the most optimal alternative route. You will receive a Route ID. Store this Route ID in memory to run both Agents. Use the tools as exactly as directed. 1. Use Financial Analyzer to find the calculated impact of delivery delay. 2. Use the Route Decision Agent to choose the most optimal route.</base_plan><description>This use case is triggered when external agents relay a Delayed Delivery Route ID, runs a cost analysis on alternative routes, and make a recommendation best suited for business needs.</description><execution_mode>copilot</execution_mode><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Analyze Delivery Delay</internal_name><name>Analyze Delivery Delay</name><record_type>custom</record_type><sys_class_name>sn_aia_usecase</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 03:09:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>5c0c130b839032107f443b64ccda1e9b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Analyze Delivery Delay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_usecase_5c0c130b839032107f443b64ccda1e9b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 23:26:05</sys_updated_on><team display_value="Delivery Delay Trigger">192e174b839032107f443b64ccda1e01</team><version>v1</version></sn_aia_usecase></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_eb697037831072107f443b64ccda1e7f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Execute the webhook</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Route ID"}]</input_schema><name>n8n webhook</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function (inputs) {
  // Configuration - Set webhook URL here
  var WEBHOOK_URL = 'https://gracekb.app.n8n.cloud/webhook-test/deliveriydelay';

  try {
    var routeId = inputs.route_id;
    if (!routeId) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Route ID is required',
        route_id: 'not_provided',
      };
    }

    // Get the delivery delay record to include additional context
    var delayGr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay');
    delayGr.addQuery('route_id', routeId);
    delayGr.query();

    if (!delayGr.next()) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Delivery delay record not found for route: ' + routeId,
        route_id: routeId,
      };
    }

    var delaySysId = delayGr.getUniqueValue();
    var truckId = delayGr.getValue('truck_id');
    var chosenOptionJson = delayGr.getValue('chosen_option');

    gs.info('N8N Webhook: Found delivery delay record, sys_id=' + delaySysId);

    // Parse chosen_option JSON if it's stored as string
    var chosenOption;
    try {
      chosenOption =
        typeof chosenOptionJson === 'string'
          ? JSON.parse(chosenOptionJson)
          : chosenOptionJson;
    } catch (e) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Failed to parse chosen_option JSON: ' + e.message,
        route_id: routeId,
      };
    }

    // Prepare webhook payload matching your expected format
    var webhookPayload = {
      route_id: routeId,
      truck_id: truckId,
      chosen_option: chosenOption,
    };

    // Make API call to N8N webhook
    var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
    request.setEndpoint(WEBHOOK_URL);
    request.setHttpMethod('POST');
    request.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
    request.setRequestHeader('Accept', 'application/json');

    var requestBody = JSON.stringify(webhookPayload);
    request.setRequestBody(requestBody);

    var startTime = new Date().getTime();
    var response = request.execute();
    var endTime = new Date().getTime();
    var responseTime = endTime - startTime;

    var httpStatusCode = response.getStatusCode();
    var responseBody = response.getBody();
    var errorMessage = response.getErrorMessage();
    var isSuccess = httpStatusCode >= 200 && httpStatusCode < 300;

    gs.info(
      'N8N Webhook: API Response - Status: ' +
        httpStatusCode +
        ', Body: ' +
        responseBody
    );

    return {
      success: isSuccess.toString(),
      message: isSuccess
        ? 'N8N workflow triggered successfully! Route ' +
          routeId +
          ' execution initiated. Response time: ' +
          responseTime +
          'ms'
        : 'Webhook failed - HTTP ' +
          httpStatusCode +
          ': ' +
          (errorMessage || responseBody),
      route_id: routeId,
      truck_id: truckId,
      chosen_option: JSON.stringify(chosenOption),
      http_status: httpStatusCode.toString(),
      response_time_ms: responseTime.toString(),
      webhook_url: WEBHOOK_URL,
    };
  } catch (e) {
    var errorMsg = 'Exception in N8N webhook call: ' + e.message;
    gs.error('N8N Webhook error: ' + errorMsg);

    return {
      success: 'false',
      message: errorMsg,
      route_id: inputs.route_id || 'unknown',
      webhook_url: WEBHOOK_URL,
    };
  }
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 23:04:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>eb697037831072107f443b64ccda1e7f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>n8n webhook</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_eb697037831072107f443b64ccda1e7f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 23:25:52</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_becedb2383d032107f443b64ccda1ea8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Creates incident record for delivery delays with the problem description</description><input_schema>[{"name":"proposed_routes","description":"propose_routes from Delivery Delay records"},{"name":"route_id","description":"route_id"},{"name":"problem_description","description":"problem_description of the delivery delay record"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Create Supply Chain Incident</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM.   
    // create script
    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ?
        inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues :
        [];

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contains that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    // each field is passed as an {id, label} obj to be displayed when editing the tool
    // each value is not passed directly, but in an object containing the fieldValue prop
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs),
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (gr.canCreate()) {
        gr.initialize();
        fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
            if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
            }
        });
    } else {
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage(
                "Cannot create record due to security constraints."
            ),
        };
    }
    var sysId = gr.insert();

    if (!sysId) {
        gs.error(gs.getMessage("[AIA AGENTS MSG] Failed to insert the record."));
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage("Failed to insert the record")
        };
    }
    return {
        sysId: sysId,
        message: gs.getMessage("Record successfully inserted into the {0} table.", [tableName]),
        status: "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 16:28:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>becedb2383d032107f443b64ccda1ea8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Supply Chain Incident</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_becedb2383d032107f443b64ccda1ea8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 19:28:58</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_2f697037831072107f443b64ccda1e79
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Locate Delivery delay record by searching to provided Route ID</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Route ID"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Pull Delivery Delay</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 23:04:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>2f697037831072107f443b64ccda1e79</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Pull Delivery Delay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">df709b0f831032107f443b64ccda1e91</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_2f697037831072107f443b64ccda1e79</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 23:56:11</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>
